Name: Abe Stark Rink
Location: Coney Island Boardwalk and West 19th Street
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: Thanksgiving Weekend (November 23 - 25): Noon to 3:00 p.m; December 26 - 30: Noon to 4:00 p.m.; New Year's Eve (December 31): Noon to 4:00 p.m; New Year's Day (January 1): Noon to 4:00 p.m., Presidents' Day (February 18): Noon to 4:00 p.m.
Notes: All information subject to change; please call ahead for details. All skaters must sign a Risk of Ice Skating/Hockey Activity Agreement. Persons under 18 years of age must have written consent form signed by parent or guardian. Agreement forms available at rink. A parent must sign the agreement form in the presence of a rink employee or parent's signature must be notarized. No exceptions.

Name: LeFrak Center at Lakeside
Location: Enter at Lincoln Road and Ocean Avenue.
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Adult: $7; $10 on weekends. Weekend pricing begins on Fridays at 4:00 p.m.
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Child: $7; $10 on weekends. Weekend pricing begins on Fridays at 4:00 p.m.
Notes: *Skate hours reflect uncovered rink only and are subject to change, weather depending. From November 5, 2018 to March 24, 2019 weekend opening hours will change to noon to 9:00 p.m. on Saturdays and noon to 5:00 p.m. on Sundays. The facility, including rinks, snack bar and Bluestone Café, may be utilized at other times for special events, private functions, classes or programmed activities, and/or rink rentals.

Name: The Rink at Bryant Park
Skate_Rental_Cost: $20., $6 sock purchase, $6 helmet rental The Rink at Bryant Park provides skate aids for $22/hour.
Locker_Information:
Lockers are free, but locks cost $10.
Bag check is $12. ($15 for large bags)
Programming: Skating lessons are available. Express skate $30, reserve skate $55.
Notes: The rink will open at noon on opening day on October 27, 2018.

Name: Lasker Rink
Location: Entrance just south of park entrance at 110th Street & Lenox Avenue.
Locker_Information:
$4.00 + $4.00 refundable deposit for lock rentals
(Deposit will be returned to the customer upon return of the lock.)
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: New Year's Eve: 10:00 a.m to 6:00 p.m.; New Year's Day: 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.
Programming: Adult hockey, youth hockey, sled hockey hockey, Learn to Skate, and more. Check laskerrink.com for more information.
Notes: Cash only. $5 for spectators. Public session on November 2, 2018: 9:30 a.m. to 4:50 p.m. and 9:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m.

Name: Wollman Rink
Locker_Information:
$5.00 + $6.00 deposit
(Deposit will be returned to the customer after lock is returned.)

Name: WWII Veterans War Memorial Ice Skating Rink
Location: Victory Blvd., west of Clove Rd.
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: Veterans Day - observed (November 12): Noon to 4:30 p.m.; November 23: Noon to 11:00 p.m.; December 26 - 30: Noon to 4:30 p.m. and 7:00 p.m. to 10:30 p.m., New Year's Eve (December 31): Noon to 4:30 p.m., New Year's Day (January 1): Noon to 4:30 p.m., Martin Luther King Jr. Day (January 21): Noon to 4:30 p.m.; Presidents’ Day (February 18): Noon to 4:30 p.m.; Mid-Winter Recess (February 19 – 21: Noon to 4: 30 p.m. and February 22: Noon to 11:00 p.m.).
Notes: Please call (718) 720-1010 before heading to the rink. For skating school information, please call (718) 390-7245. Persons under 18 years of age must have written consent form signed by parent or guardian. Agreement forms are available at rink. A parent must sign the agreement form in the presence of a rink employee or parent's signature must be notarized. No exceptions.

Name: World Ice Arena
Skate_Rental_Cost: $6.00/person. You must wear socks to rent skates.
Locker_Information: Coin-operated lockers are available for rent ($0.75 per use).
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: For holiday public skating hours, please visit worldice.com for more information.
Programming: Please see the World Ice Arena website for details on Learn to Skate, hockey, and freestyle skate programming.
Notes: World Ice Arena is a year-round ice skating rink. The facility is Sled Hockey Accessible.
